name: df-ghomOLD
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cghomOLD, cmpo(s0, s1, cgr, cgr, cab(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), crn(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s1))), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ GrpOpHom =(s0 ∈ GrpOp, s1 ∈ GrpOp ↦ { s2 |((s2 : ran(s0)→ ran(s1))∧ ∀(s3 ∈ ran(s0), ∀(s4 ∈ ran(s0),((s2 ` s3)[s1](s2 ` s4))=(s2 `(s3[s0]s4)))))})
comment: Obsolete version of ~ df-ghm as of 15-Mar-2020. Define the set of group homomorphisms from ` g ` to ` h ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
